com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenControlImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenControlBase
        • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenControlImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback

    public class SpenControlImage
extends SpenControlBase
    the control class that manages image object. ControlImage is sub class of ControlBase. It is a control class for managing image object which is been selected.

    Since:
    3.0.0
